price: Quem espera o deparar de Allah, por certo, o termo de Allah chegará. E Ele é O Oniouvinte, O Onisciente.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
